src:
14-åring stanset i stjålet bil
Skal ha framstått beruset.
03 Nov 2019, 06:26 by Matias Ytterstad
En 14 år gammel gutt ble tidlig søndag morgen stanset i en stjålet bil på Langeland på Stord.
Politiet skriver på Twitter at gutten skal ha framstått beruset, og at han blir kjørt til legevakta for blodprøve.
Bileier er varslet om at politiet har kontroll på bilen hans, og guttens foreldre og barnevernet vil bli varslet om saken.
text:
14-year-old stopped in stolen car
Must have been drunk.
03 Nov 2019, 06:26 by Matias Ytterstad
A 14-year-old boy was stopped early Sunday morning in a stolen car at Langeland on Stord.
Police write on Twitter that the boy must have appeared intoxicated, and that he be taken to the emergency room for blood tests.
The car owner has been notified that the police are in control of his car and the boy's parents and child welfare will be notified of the case.
